product_name: Opard Sports Water Bottle 600ml Leak Proof Flip Top BPA Free Tritan
description: DRINK WITH SINGLE HAND -- Designed to be slim and easy to hold. You can pop up the lid, drink, and lock up with a single hand, which makes hydrating convenient while you are driving or jogging, or stuck on something. BPA-FREE -- Made of Tritan, the best safe and durable plastic for bottles. Non-toxic and eco-friendly, yet still do not put the bottle into the dishwasher. FRUIT RECIPES INCLUDED -- Fruits provide not only Vitamins but also a variety of flavors. To help you mix them right, we organize some popular recipes and send them with the item. Feel free to contact us for an e-book if you need it. REMOVABLE STRAINER -- When you put ice or other stuff in the water, you will need a strainer to keep the solids from flowing out. VOLUME MARKED -- Volumes are marked with oz and ml, it's 20oz/600ml when full.

latest_reviews.review_title: A Great Water Bottle Doesn't Have to Be Expensive
latest_reviews.review_text:
My previous water bottle was the last of set and it was well past its prime. I started looking for a new bottle and was surprised at the prices that were being asked. I found this bottle and decided to give it a try, and I haven't been disappointed.

I bought one in the green color, and was happy to see that it had the same soft look as you see in their photos. The size if quite comfortable in my hand, and the texture makes if feel soft rather than plastic. The cap pops open with a quick thumb press, and yet when closed it seals quite well.
The material could be more resistant, but for the price, it's worth it.
The material could be more resistant, but for the price, it's worth it.
Some reviews mentioned that the recycling number is hard to see and it really does. The quality feels great, and I feel confident letting my daughter use it.
